# CSDS 343 HW5
## 1
### a
Construct a FSA equivalent to the REG EX

$1[((01)^*+1+01)^*+1]^*0$

> Below is the FSA equivalent to the REG EX

```{mermaid}
stateDiagram
    q0-->qstart1:1
    qstart1-->qstart2:0
        
        qstart2-->qend2:1
        qend2-->qstart2:0
        qend2-->qend1:epsilon

        qstart1-->qstart1:1

    qstart1-->qend1:epsilon

    qend1-->qaccept:0
```

### b
Construct a REG EX equivalent to the FSA
```{mermaid}
stateDiagram
    q0-->q1:0
    q0-->q0:1
    q1-->q0:0
    q1-->qa:1
    qa-->q0:0
    qa-->q1:1
```

> Regex Equivalent:
> $(1+0(0+10))^*01(11)^*$
